messages.subject: woudl lvoe some new insights
messages.msgSnippet: i d love to know how you would have handled the crayon situation...even if i don t agree with the input, i could use a fresh perspective and see if there s
messages.messageBody:
i'd love to know how you would have handled the crayon
situation...even if i don't agree with the input, i could use a fresh
perspective and see if there's anything i can glean from it. i need
to find a new way of looking at things.

tina


Maybe: Wow, looks like we need some new crayons. We'll have to get some new ones the next time we are at the store. Maybe a big box we can all share. In the meantime, do you want to do something different?

Hard to manage while everyone is yelling though. And I completely relate about the heat -- it's in the 90s here in FL already. The visiting 2-year-old spends a lot of time with the hose. :)

Nance



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
